document.full_text: australia's huge cattle herd in the north might be burping less planet-warming methane emissions than thought, a study released on friday shows, suggesting the cows are more climate friendly.
document.title: australia's burping cows more climate friendly than thought
lines_and_colors: australia's huge cattle herd in the north might be burping less planet-warming methane emissions than thought, a study released on friday shows, suggesting the cows are more climate friendly.
